title: It's The Year Of The Recall, And It Finds GM Busy
teaser: The auto industry is enduring a year of recalls. General Motors alone has recalled more than 25 million vehicles in the U.S. so far in 2014, and other automakers are also picking up the pace of their vehicle recalls.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
